document.full_text: south korean president lee myung-bak said on monday he was ready to invite north korea's leader kim jong-il to a security summit next year if kim agreed to renounce nuclear weapons.
document.title: south korea to invite north to summit if conditions met
lines_and_colors: south korean president lee myung-bak said on monday he was ready to invite north korea's leader kim jong-il to a security summit next year if kim agreed to renounce nuclear weapons.
